sentence: Reps. Dan Newhouse (Wash.) and Peter Meijer (Mich.) are two other Republicans who voted for impeachment and look well placed to turn back Trump-backed challengers.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) is the only other member in a swing district Biden carried his seat by 9 points.
title: Defiant GOP impeachment voters gear up for Trump-backed primaries

sentence: Three more Trump-endorsed candidates running against Republican House members who voted to impeach Trump over Jan. 6 will have a spot on stage: Loren Culp, who is challenging Rep. Dan Newhouse of Washington state; former Housing and Urban Development official John Gibbs, who is challenging Rep. Peter Meijer of Michigan; and Russell Fry, who is challenging Rep. Tom Rice of South Carolina.
title: Trump's Mar-a-Lago 'Magapalooza': Boost allies, settle scores

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) faces John Gibbs, a former Trump administration official.
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Veteran lawmaker's exit has House GOP trending toward Trump

sentence: We turn next to Michigan's 3rd in the Grand Rapids area, where Trump's forces have consolidated behind conservative commentator John Gibbs' bid to deny renomination to freshman Rep. Peter Meijer in August.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising

sentence: * Versus U.S. Representative Peter Meijer * Aug 2 Republican primary for Michigan's 3rd congressional district Gibbs, a former housing official under Trump, saw his nomination to head the U.S. Office of Personnel Management flounder after lawmakers from both parties questioned his history of inflammatory tweets, including references to baseless conspiracy theories about Democrats and Satanism.
author: Reuters
title: Factbox: Trump's endorsement power faces test in key elections
